name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing high-performance solutions leveraging modern **TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Node.js** technologies. My extensive technical toolkit includes **Docker**, **AWS**, and **PostgreSQL**, enabling me to create scalable applications that align with industry standards. I am proficient in building robust **RESTful APIs** and implementing **CI/CD** practices to enhance deployment efficiency.

In my previous roles, I led the design of enterprise-grade platforms, incorporating AI solutions with **OpenAI**, **LangChain**, and **Mastra AI** for intelligent automation and real-time data processing. My strong knowledge in microservices architecture and event-driven systems ensures high reliability and maintainability.

I possess a solid understanding of **Prisma**, **Redis**, and message queue services such as **RabbitMQ** and **BullMQ**, enhancing application responsiveness. Furthermore, my experience with **WebSockets** and frameworks like **NestJS** and **Fastify** allows me to build rich, interactive web applications. I also have hands-on expertise in LLM fundamentals and data retrieval techniques using **PGVector** and **Pinecone**, further enriching the applications I develop.
